english.segment1: God I messed it up again, I seem to do this all the time. Can you forgive me once again, or have I finally crossed the line?. They say Your grace is always with me and You're near me all the time. If that's the case I pray sincerely that Your love is truly blind
english.segment2: The people on the outside watching me follow the crowd, find a way out. You know something on the inside's pushing me without a doubt. So I'm letting it go
english.segment3: I'm never always right and it's plain to see. You love me Jesus, it's a mystery. You know my faults, You know my wrongs. And You still love me
english.segment4: God I know that You exist, I've been told a thousand times. But my friends they all insist that the truth is just a lie. You see the life that they all live seems like a party all the time. The temptations I resist, because it's You I glorify

english.segment7: Let everything that I do or say reflect You in every way. Your way
